::Shredder::

Shredder nods as he recieves Mantella's transmission. He looks down at his 
scanners, trying to find the location of the ship Magmatron was attacking, 
but they were too damaged. He frowns as Mantella finishes her message. Why 
was she always worrying about what he was doing.

"I'm heading back to base," he replies, "I'll repair and go help with the 
attack."
